title: Sri Lanka stock trades 1-pct stronger in mid-day trade
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s stock market gained over 1 percent within the first hour of trade on Thursday (09).
The main All Share Price Index, after opening over 1 percent established to 1.34 percent or 104.29 points to 7,876.98 by 1145 hrs.
The most liquid index S&P SL20 gained 1.50 percent or 37.92 points to 2,567.01.
